scripts.generate-html-clean: cd ./tools/testdocs-cli; tsc; node ./dist/cli.js gendocs json ../../working/source-files ../../working/output-files --cfg ./config.json; node ./dist/cli.js gendocs html ../../working/output-files/full-test-suite.json ../../docs/index.html
scripts.generate-markdown-clean: cd ./tools/testdocs-cli; tsc; node ./dist/cli.js gendocs json ../../working/source-files/ ../../working/output-files --cfg ./config.json; node ./dist/cli.js gendocs markdown ../../working/output-files/full-test-suite.json ../../docs/ReadMe.md
